mapper.sql: SELECT EG.recid , EG.group_name , EG.group_path , EG.parent_group_recid , EG.create_dt , EG.create_ip , EG.create_user , EG.update_dt , EG.update_ip , EG.update_user FROM equip_group_info EG
mapper.select: INNER JOIN (SELECT parent_group_recid FROM equip_group_info WHERE recid = #{recid}) B ON EG.parent_group_recid = B.parent_group_recid

WITH RECURSIVE result_sub_group AS ( SELECT recid FROM equip_group_info WHERE recid = #{recid}
UNION ALL
SELECT A.recid FROM equip_group_info A INNER JOIN result_sub_group B ON A.parent_group_recid = B.recid )
INNER JOIN result_sub_group B ON EG.recid = B.recid

WITH RECURSIVE result_sub_group AS ( SELECT recid, parent_group_recid FROM equip_group_info WHERE recid = #{recid}
UNION ALL
SELECT A.recid, A.parent_group_recid FROM equip_group_info A INNER JOIN result_sub_group B ON A.recid = B.parent_group_recid )
INNER JOIN result_sub_group B ON EG.recid = B.recid
